title: American Horror Story Apocalypse Trailer Reaction
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I squealed so loud my kids thought the actual apocalypse was happening.

Okay so did anyone notice that the Michael Langdon character at 0:03-0:04 seconds in of the trailer is wearing the same outfit as the butler men in the background at the Coven house at 0:10 in? So maybe Michael is going to be a butler like Spalding was for the witches and then discovers he’s the antichrist??
Mary, the full trailer comes out tomorrow, this is a teaser of the trailer

The way he’s been promoting recent seasons literally have us waiting till the last min kinda allows me to overshoot my expectations. Roanoke and cult weren’t so bad bc they were their own themed season. But w this season because he did say it was a crossover I’m expecting all the bells and whistles and bring back old ahs vibes like in seasons 1-3. I watched this trailer and it just makes me feel like it won’t be what I’ve been thinking it will be like for months now and I’m back at square one and don’t really know what to expect.
Your my fav AHS YouTuber Mary. I love your reactions.
